    C

    calculateFine(LocalDate) - Method in class domain.Loan
    Computes fine for overdue loans using media fine per day; sets fine to 0 if not overdue.
    calculateMemberFineSummary(Admin, Member, LocalDate) - Method in class application.AdminActions
    Calculates total fines for a member as of the given date.
    calculateTotalFines(Iterable<Loan>, LocalDate) - Method in class domain.Member
    Calculates the total fines across the provided loans for this member as of the given date.
    calculateTotalFinesForMember(Member, LocalDate) - Method in class application.LoanService
    Calculates the total fines for all loans belonging to a member.
    canBeUnregistered(Member) - Method in class application.AdminActions
    Indicates whether a member can be unregistered.
    canBorrow() - Method in class domain.Member
    Determines whether the member is eligible to borrow books.
    canBorrow(Member, LoanRepository) - Method in class application.BorrowingRules
    Determines whether a member can borrow: Member must have no unpaid fines (member.canBorrow() == true) Member must not have any overdue active loans
    CD - Class in domain
    Represents a Compact Disc (CD) media item with artist information and specific borrowing/fine policy.
    CD() - Constructor for class domain.CD
    Creates a new CD with default values.
    CD(String, String, String) - Constructor for class domain.CD
    Creates a new CD with the given identifier, title, and artist.
    CDRepository - Class in persistence
    In-memory repository for CD media items.
    CDRepository() - Constructor for class persistence.CDRepository
    Creates a new CDRepository with empty storage.
    CDService - Class in application
    Application layer service for Compact Discs (CD) handling borrow/return operations and overdue fine calculation.
    CDService() - Constructor for class application.CDService
    Creates a new CDService instance.
    checkPassword(String) - Method in class domain.Person
    Verifies whether the provided password matches the stored one.
    clearAdmins() - Static method in class persistence.AdminRepository
    Clears all admins from the repository (useful for tests).
    clearBooks() - Static method in class persistence.BookRepository
    Clears all books in the repository (useful for tests).
    clearCDs() - Static method in class persistence.CDRepository
    Clear repository (useful for tests).
    clearLoans() - Static method in class persistence.LoanRepository
    Clears all loans (useful for tests).
    clearMembers() - Static method in class persistence.MemberRepository
    Clears all members from the repository (useful for testing).
    countActiveLoans() - Method in class application.LoanService
    Counts active loans in the repository.
    countBooks() - Method in class application.BookService
    Counts the total number of books tracked by the repository.
    countReturnedOn(LocalDate) - Method in class application.LoanService
    Counts loans returned exactly on a given date.
